top_comments.comment: I love how Claudio just didn’t say anything and complemented the soup when it poured on him.
Thea asking "how am i doing guys" after people cheer for Trevor is so cringy....

I love Claudio's reaction at having food thrown on him xD

Any person's reaction : "You clumsy moron, look at what you've done you donut!!!" 
Claudio's reaction : *YUM!* xD
I felt that instinctually when her soup fell on Claudio.
Jeremy's overconfident cost him the final

comments_since_last_sample.body: I feel like judge Alvin purposely tries to come off as annoying. But he is a good guy.
